positive_english: How do I reset my password?
target_doc: To reset password, go to settings > security.

anchor_hinglish: screen flicker ho raha hai kya karu?
target_doc: Screen flickering can be caused by outdated drivers.

anchor_hinglish: battery bohot jaldi drain ho rahi hai
target_doc: Enable battery saver mode to extend life.

anchor_hinglish: wifi connected hai but internet nahi chal raha
target_doc: Restart your router and check ISP settings.

anchor_hinglish: charging ke time phone heat ho raha hai
target_doc: Remove the case and avoid using phone while charging.
